SRA Toolkit: prefetch and fastq-dump
AGAT: agat_convert_sp_gff2gtf.pl. https://github.com/NBISweden/AGAT
HISAT2. https://daehwankimlab.github.io/hisat2/download/
SAMtools. http://www.htslib.org/download/
StringTie and prepDE.py. https://github.com/gpertea/stringtie
gffcompare. https://github.com/gpertea/gffcompare
Ballgown.
